title: Nanticoke Historical Society Designer Purse Bingo
title_page: Nanticoke Historical Society Designer Purse Bingo
maintext: The Nanticoke Historical Society will hold a designer purse bingo at 1 p.m. Saturday, May 18, at the Warrior Run Fire Hall, 316 Academy St., Warrior Run. There will be designer purses by Michael Kors, Coach and Dooney and Bourke, gift cards and baskets and 50/50 drawings. There will be refreshments and gourmet-style foods and dessert. Tickets for $20 will be available in February. Tickets purchased at the door will be $25. Committee members, from left, are Janine Whittaker, Sally Gorgas, Julianna Zarzycki, president of the Nanticoke Historical Society, and Judy Minsavage. For information on the event or to donate to this fundraiser, call Janine at 570-574-2523 or Sally Gorgas, 570-332-4253.
